sect3.title: Program Files
sect3.para: badblocks, chattr, compile_et, debugfs, dumpe2fs, e2fsck, e2image, e2label, fsck, fsck.ext2, fsck.ext3, lsattr, mk_cmds, mke2fs, mkfs.ext2, mklost+found, resize2fs, tune2fs and uuidgen

sect4.title: badblocks
sect4.para: badblocks is used to search for bad blocks on a device (usually a disk partition).

sect4.title: chattr
sect4.para: chattr changes the file attributes on a Linux second extended file system.

sect4.title: compile_et
sect4.para: compile_et is used to convert a table listing error-code names and associated messages into a C source file suitable for use with the com_err library

sect4.title: debugfs
sect4.para: The debugfs program is a file system debugger. It can be used to examine and change the state of an ext2 file system.

sect4.title: dumpe2fs
sect4.para: dumpe2fs prints the super block and blocks group information for the filesystem present on a specified device.

sect4.title: e2fsck and fsck.ext2
sect4.para: e2fsck is used to check and optionally repair Linux second extended filesystems. fsck.ext2 does the same as e2fsck.

sect4.title: e2image
sect4.para: e2image is used to save critical ext2 filesystem data to a file

sect4.title: e2label
sect4.para: e2label will display or change the filesystem label on the ext2 filesystem located on the specified device.

sect4.title: fsck
sect4.para: fsck is used to check and optionally repair a Linux file system.

sect4.title: fsck.ext3
sect4.para: fsck.ext3 is used to check and optionally repair a Linux ext3 filesystems

sect4.title: lsattr
sect4.para: lsattr lists the file attributes on a second extended file system.

sect4.title: mk_cmds
sect4.para: No description is currently available.

sect4.title: mke2fs and mkfs.ext2
sect4.para: mke2fs is used to create a Linux second extended file system on a device (usually a disk partition). mkfs.ext2 does the same as mke2fs.

sect4.title: mklost+found
sect4.para: mklost+found is used to create a lost+found directory in the current working directory on a Linux second extended file system. mklost+found pre-allocates disk blocks to the directory to make it usable by e2fsck.

sect4.title: resize2fs
sect4.para: resize2fs is used to resize ext2 file systems.

sect4.title: tune2fs
sect4.para: tune2fs adjusts tunable filesystem parameters on a Linux second extended filesystem.

sect4.title: uuidgen
sect4.para: The uuidgen program creates a new universally unique identifier (UUID) using the libuuid library. The new UUID can reasonably be considered unique among all UUIDs created on the local system, and among UUIDs created on other systems in the past and in the future.

sect4.title: libcom_err
sect4.para: No description is currently available.

sect4.title: libe2p
sect4.para: No description is currently available.

sect4.title: libext2fs
sect4.para: No description is currently available.

sect4.title: libss
sect4.para: No description is currently available.

sect4.title: libuuid
sect4.para: No description is currently available.
